sentences: Me peame vabastama oma mõttest tagasilükkamist.
Ta palus kohtu vabastada ta süüdistustest.
Selle filmi tegevus toetub sellele, et võimukas isik vabastab relvi.
context: Vabastada is used in Estonian to denote releasing something from a state of captivity or restriction, whether it be physical objects, people, thoughts, or abstract concepts. It often carries the connotation of liberation.
